tion rate, a boronate ester COF (COF-5) was used as an HHTP
source. As the framework of COF-5 is composed of HHTP and
boronic acid, and the boronate ester bond easily undergoes
hydrolysis, HHTP molecules are expected to be released grad-
ually under ambient conditions, which could in turn control the

and HHTP molecules were released in the DMF solvent. The

The yellow molecules represent DMF. The gray, red, and purple atoms
represent C, O, and N, respectively; H atoms are omitted for clarity.
